summary: Phase 1 Consulting Flow Testing Complete. All 8 features tested successfully: MyProjects page loads at /consulting/my-projects, ConsultingStageNav shows 7 stages with proper styling, Back button works, ViewToggle switches between Card/List views, project cards display progress ring/scope counts/team avatars/payment frequency, list view shows correct columns, AssignTeam page loads at /consulting/assign-team/{projectId}, and kickoff acceptance redirects to AssignTeam page.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - endpoint may not exist or not configured

issues: Hydration warning for nested span/tr/tbody in table - cosmetic only, no functional impact
Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

When on MyProjects page (Stage 3), clicking Back navigates to /consulting/assign-team without projectId, resulting in 'No routes matched' - this is by design since MyProjects shows multiple projects and there's no single projectId context. Consider disabling Back button when no projectId context available.

action_items: Optional: Consider adding aria-describedby to DialogContent in AssignTeam.js for accessibility
Optional: Consider disabling Back button on MyProjects when no projectId context is available
critical_code_review_comments: ConsultingStageNav component correctly implements 7 stages with proper data-testid attributes
ViewToggle component works correctly with Card/List view switching on MyProjects page
AssignTeam page properly shows Stage 2 and allows consultant assignment
Kickoff acceptance flow correctly redirects to AssignTeam page with projectId
Project cards display all required elements: progress ring, scope counts, team avatars, payment frequency
List view displays all required columns: Project, Company, Team, Scopes, Progress, Payment, Status, Actions
seed_data_creation: Created test project via kickoff acceptance: TEST_Kickoff_Project / TEST_Kickoff_Client
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 Consulting Flow fully tested. MyProjects page at /consulting/my-projects shows handed-over SOWs with progress rings, scope counts, team avatars, and payment frequency. AssignTeam page at /consulting/assign-team/{projectId} allows PM to assign consultants to projects. ConsultingStageNav shows 7 stages: Kickoff, Team Assignment, My Projects, SOW Management, Roadmap, Payments, Performance. Kickoff acceptance creates project and redirects to AssignTeam page.

features_tested.ConsultingStageNav shows 7 stages with p: PASSED - Kickoff(1), Team Assignment(2), My Projects(3), SOW Management(4), Roadmap(5), Payments(6), Performance(7)
features_tested.List view displays table columns: PASSED - Project, Company, Team, Scopes, Progress, Payment, Status, Actions
